content: What's next for Robert Downey Jr.?

Robert Downey Jr. has been a prominent figure in Hollywood for decades, known for his diverse roles and iconic performances. After stepping down from his role as Iron Man in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, fans and industry professionals alike have been curious about his future projects.

As of now, Downey Jr. is set to star in several upcoming films. One of the highly anticipated projects is "Dune: Part Two," directed by Denis Villeneuve. In this highly anticipated sequel, Downey Jr. will reprise his role as the enigmatic character Piter De Vries. The film is set to continue the epic tale of Paul Atreides and his journey to become the messiah of the desert planet Arrakis.

In addition to "Dune: Part Two," Downey Jr. is also attached to star in "The Golem," a supernatural thriller directed by Nacho Vigalondo. The film revolves around a man who inherits an ancient artifact that grants him the power to control time and space. However, with great power comes great responsibility, and Downey Jr.'s character must navigate the dangerous consequences of his newfound abilities.

Furthermore, Downey Jr. is set to appear in "The Voyage of Darwin," a biographical drama directed by Peter Webber. The film explores the life and scientific discoveries of the renowned naturalist Charles Darwin during his landmark voyage aboard the HMS Beagle. Downey Jr. will portray Darwin, delving into the intellectual and emotional journey that shaped his groundbreaking theories on evolution.

Apart from these film projects, Downey Jr. has also been involved in various other ventures. He is an executive producer on the Apple TV+ series "Severance," which explores a unique corporate office where employees undergo a procedure to sever their work and personal lives. The show has garnered critical acclaim for its thought-provoking premise and Downey Jr.'s involvement adds to the intrigue.

Moreover, Downey Jr. has been vocal about his passion for technology and innovation. He has invested in several startups and even founded his own production company, Team Downey, which focuses on developing projects that blend entertainment with cutting-edge technology.

In conclusion, Robert Downey Jr. has an exciting slate of projects on the horizon. From his return to the world of "Dune" to his exploration of supernatural thrills in "The Golem" and his portrayal of Charles Darwin in "The Voyage of Darwin," Downey Jr. continues to showcase his versatility as an actor. Additionally, his involvement in various ventures beyond acting demonstrates his commitment to pushing boundaries and exploring new frontiers in entertainment and technology. Fans can look forward to seeing more of his talents in the coming years.
